Pre-Game Insights: The Dallas Mavericks are ranked ninth in the NBA with 33.9 defensive rebounds per game, led by Luka Doncic averaging 7.6.
The Los Angeles Lakers are 8-11 against opponents over.500 this season.

Miscellaneous Highlights: The game is scheduled in Dallas, Texas, at 7:30 p.m. EST with a BETMGM SPORTSBOOK LINE of Lakers -6.5; over/under is 218.5.
